en.title: FE Press Conference with Maggie Loo and KC Phoon
en.content:
FE recently held a press conference with 12 newspapers in Kuching with Presidential Director KC Phoon and Maggie Loo, former Miss Malaysia Universe, now QP Wearer and FE Leader. Both KC and Maggie did a great job, the result of which was great coverage in the newspapers the following day. The media were also impressed with the demonstrations of FE's Quantum Pendant performed by FE leader Rena Chong.
< Link Newspaper 1>  < Link Newspaper 2>   < Link Newspaper 3 >
